Unlock Your Potential: When you hear others effortlessly completing their tasks, it's natural to feel a twinge of jealousy. But instead of letting it consume you, use it as motivation to unlock your own potential. Identify the areas where you struggle and find ways to improve. Take small steps towards your goals each day, and before you know it, you'll be completing tasks with ease too.

Embrace Your Own Pace: It's important to remember that everyone works at their own pace, and that's okay. Don't compare yourself to others or feel like you're falling behind. Instead, focus on your own progress and celebrate your achievements, no matter how small they may seem. By embracing your own pace, you'll find a sense of peace and contentment that will help you stay motivated and focused.

Find Your Unique Strengths: When you see others completing tasks with ease, it's easy to feel like you're not good enough. But the truth is, everyone has their own unique strengths and weaknesses. Instead of comparing yourself to others, focus on your own strengths and find ways to utilize them to your advantage. By playing to your strengths, you'll find a sense of confidence and self-worth that will help you tackle tasks with ease.

Break Tasks Down into Manageable Chunks: Sometimes, tasks can seem overwhelming, especially when you see others completing them with ease. But the truth is, every task can be broken down into smaller, more manageable chunks. By breaking tasks down into smaller parts, you'll find it easier to stay focused and motivated. Start by tackling one small part of the task at a time, and before you know it, you'll be completing tasks with ease.

Practice Mindfulness: When you feel jealous of others' productivity, it's easy to get caught up in negative thoughts and feelings of inadequacy. But the truth is, mindfulness can help you stay grounded and focused. Practice mindfulness techniques such as deep breathing, meditation, or yoga to help you stay present and centered.
